title: Kimi no Na wa.
summary:
The action in the anime Your Name will take place in two cities. The main characters are a couple of ordinary people who do not even suspect that soon fate will connect their lives very firmly. They have never been acquainted, she is a favorite daughter who devotes her free time to work in the temple. He is a reliable friend, successful and hard-working at work, has not bad tasks of a talented artist. Her life is calm and measured in a small provincial town, while he lives in a huge metropolis, full of turmoil and constant escapism.
Mitsuha Miyamizu and Taki Tachibana have never met each other, and yet one strange event binds them together. One day in a dream they switch bodies and it's unclear how to control this process. This begins to repeat more and more often, which will create a lot of problems in the lives of our heroes, because waking up every day in someone else's bed in someone else's house is not very pleasant. But what is the reason for such unusual metamorphosis? This is what the main characters will have to figure out.

title: Koe no Katachi
summary:
Everyone can make mistakes, but not everyone can realize it, then they feel shame. The plot of this anime tells the story of a boy Shoya Ishida and a girl Shoko Nishimiya. The girl has had hearing problems since childhood, and she had to suffer a lot because of it. The narrative starts at school, with their acquaintance, little Shoko is transferred to Shoya. She is initially disliked by most people, due to the fact that she was different from the others. He then makes the decision to ruin her life and bullies her.
The frequent bullying of young Shoko gets to a scary point, the guys just shamed her everywhere, made fun of her and made her cry all the time. One day, Shoya goes out of line, randomly, he hurts her right ear, after which the girl stops hearing them. She can no longer tolerate and moves to another city, the culprit begins a strong psychological disorder, feels a strong sense of guilt. And so in high school they meet. He realizes that this is a chance to correct the past between them.

title: Nakitai Watashi wa Neko wo Kaburu
summary: Miyo Sasaki, nicknamed "Muge", is an active and bright girl who is head over heels in love with her classmate Kento Hinode. Miyo's attempts to attract his attention fail, but the situation changes when she finds a magical mask that allows her to transform into "Taro", the cute white cat that Kento loves so much. The course of events seems tempting, but as time passes, the boundary between the girl and the cat begins to disappear.

title: Kimetsu no Yaiba Movie: Mugen Ressha-hen
family: The blade that cuts through demons
summary:
A full-length sequel to the anime series "Demon-Splitting Blade".
Tanjiro and his friends complete their recreational training at the Butterfly House and go on a new mission. Something fishy is going on on the Infinite Train: over 40 people disappear overnight! That means Tanjiro, Nezuko, Inosuke and Zenitsu will have to fight a powerful demon. Joining one of the strongest swordsmen - the flaming pillar Kyojuro Rengoku, the heroes challenge the enemy, while the train "Infinite" rushes into the valley of despair..

title: Tenki no Ko
summary: High school senior Hodaka Morishima leaves his remote island home and moves to Tokyo, where he immediately squanders all his money and begins to be poor until he finds a job at a dubious occult magazine. And just as he begins his new duties, the weather turns bad and it rains every day. One day on the streets of a crowded and bustling city, Hodaka meets a girl named Hina Amano. Due to some circumstances, Hina and her younger brother live alone, but have a fun and healthy life. She can stop the rain and disperse the clouds.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0 Movie
summary:
A boy, Yuta, and a girl, Rika, agree to get married when they come of age. Rika reinforces the seriousness of her intentions with a wedding ring, which she gives to Yuta. The boy accepts the gift, confirming his agreement to a future together. Soon Rika tragically dies under the wheels of a car in front of Yuta. The desperation of the dying girl gives birth to the strongest monster - a curse, which becomes an invisible guardian of Utah and cruelly punishes all his offenders.
A series of inexplicable emergencies attracts the attention of a magical association, which places Yuta under the supervision of Satoru Gojo, the strongest magician in Japan, who teaches at the Tokyo Magic School. Yuta makes new classmate friends, each with their own set of oddities and abilities. New knowledge about the structure of the magical world sparks hope that the boy will be able to dispel the curse of Ricky. But first he must survive a deadly battle with Suguru Gato, a high school graduate who has turned to the dark side.
The strongest evil magician intends to get Rika and with the help of her power to change the world order. All humans will be destroyed, and only the strongest mages who support Gato will gain power. Yuta, Satoru Gojo and other students do not agree with this and try to destroy the dark plan of the cruel magician with all their might.

The girl has had hearing problems since childhood, and she had to suffer a lot because of it. The narrative starts at school, with their acquaintance, little Shoko is transferred to Shoya. She is initially disliked by most people, due to the fact that she was different from the others. He then makes the decision to ruin her life and bullies her.
The frequent bullying of young Shoko gets to a scary point, the guys just shamed her everywhere, made fun of her and made her cry all the time. One day, Shoya goes out of line, randomly, he hurts her right ear, after which the girl stops hearing them. She can no longer tolerate and moves to another city, the culprit begins a strong psychological disorder, feels a strong sense of guilt. And so in high school they meet. He realizes that this is a chance to correct the past between them.

title: Nakitai Watashi wa Neko wo Kaburu
summary: Miyo Sasaki, nicknamed "Muge", is an active and bright girl who is head over heels in love with her classmate Kento Hinode. Miyo's attempts to attract his attention fail, but the situation changes when she finds a magical mask that allows her to transform into "Taro", the cute white cat that Kento loves so much. The course of events seems tempting, but as time passes, the boundary between the girl and the cat begins to disappear.

title: Kimetsu no Yaiba Movie: Mugen Ressha-hen
family: The blade that cuts through demons
summary:
A full-length sequel to the anime series "Demon-Splitting Blade".
Tanjiro and his friends complete their recreational training at the Butterfly House and go on a new mission. Something fishy is going on on the Infinite Train: over 40 people disappear overnight! That means Tanjiro, Nezuko, Inosuke and Zenitsu will have to fight a powerful demon. Joining one of the strongest swordsmen - the flaming pillar Kyojuro Rengoku, the heroes challenge the enemy, while the train "Infinite" rushes into the valley of despair..

title: Kimi no Na wa.

Mitsuha Miyamizu and Taki Tachibana have never met each other, and yet one strange event binds them together. One day in a dream they switch bodies and it's unclear how to control this process. This begins to repeat more and more often, which will create a lot of problems in the lives of our heroes, because waking up every day in someone else's bed in someone else's house is not very pleasant. But what is the reason for such unusual metamorphosis? This is what the main characters will have to figure out.

title: Tenki no Ko
summary: High school senior Hodaka Morishima leaves his remote island home and moves to Tokyo, where he immediately squanders all his money and begins to be poor until he finds a job at a dubious occult magazine. And just as he begins his new duties, the weather turns bad and it rains every day. One day on the streets of a crowded and bustling city, Hodaka meets a girl named Hina Amano. Due to some circumstances, Hina and her younger brother live alone, but have a fun and healthy life. She can stop the rain and disperse the clouds.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0 Movie
summary:
A boy, Yuta, and a girl, Rika, agree to get married when they come of age. Rika reinforces the seriousness of her intentions with a wedding ring, which she gives to Yuta. The boy accepts the gift, confirming his agreement to a future together. Soon Rika tragically dies under the wheels of a car in front of Yuta. The desperation of the dying girl gives birth to the strongest monster - a curse, which becomes an invisible guardian of Utah and cruelly punishes all his offenders.
A series of inexplicable emergencies attracts the attention of a magical association, which places Yuta under the supervision of Satoru Gojo, the strongest magician in Japan, who teaches at the Tokyo Magic School. Yuta makes new classmate friends, each with their own set of oddities and abilities. New knowledge about the structure of the magical world sparks hope that the boy will be able to dispel the curse of Ricky. But first he must survive a deadly battle with Suguru Gato, a high school graduate who has turned to the dark side.
The strongest evil magician intends to get Rika and with the help of her power to change the world order. All humans will be destroyed, and only the strongest mages who support Gato will gain power. Yuta, Satoru Gojo and other students do not agree with this and try to destroy the dark plan of the cruel magician with all their might.

title: Tenki no Ko
summary: High school senior Hodaka Morishima leaves his remote island home and moves to Tokyo, where he immediately squanders all his money and begins to be poor until he finds a job at a dubious occult magazine. And just as he begins his new duties, the weather turns bad and it rains every day. One day on the streets of a crowded and bustling city, Hodaka meets a girl named Hina Amano. Due to some circumstances, Hina and her younger brother live alone, but have a fun and healthy life. She can stop the rain and disperse the clouds.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0 Movie
summary:
A boy, Yuta, and a girl, Rika, agree to get married when they come of age. Rika reinforces the seriousness of her intentions with a wedding ring, which she gives to Yuta. The boy accepts the gift, confirming his agreement to a future together. Soon Rika tragically dies under the wheels of a car in front of Yuta. The desperation of the dying girl gives birth to the strongest monster - a curse, which becomes an invisible guardian of Utah and cruelly punishes all his offenders.
A series of inexplicable emergencies attracts the attention of a magical association, which places Yuta under the supervision of Satoru Gojo, the strongest magician in Japan, who teaches at the Tokyo Magic School. Yuta makes new classmate friends, each with their own set of oddities and abilities. New knowledge about the structure of the magical world sparks hope that the boy will be able to dispel the curse of Ricky. But first he must survive a deadly battle with Suguru Gato, a high school graduate who has turned to the dark side.
The strongest evil magician intends to get Rika and with the help of her power to change the world order. All humans will be destroyed, and only the strongest mages who support Gato will gain power. Yuta, Satoru Gojo and other students do not agree with this and try to destroy the dark plan of the cruel magician with all their might.

Miyo's attempts to attract his attention fail, but the situation changes when she finds a magical mask that allows her to transform into "Taro", the cute white cat that Kento loves so much. The course of events seems tempting, but as time passes, the boundary between the girl and the cat begins to disappear.

title: Kimetsu no Yaiba Movie: Mugen Ressha-hen
family: The blade that cuts through demons
summary:
A full-length sequel to the anime series "Demon-Splitting Blade".
Tanjiro and his friends complete their recreational training at the Butterfly House and go on a new mission. Something fishy is going on on the Infinite Train: over 40 people disappear overnight! That means Tanjiro, Nezuko, Inosuke and Zenitsu will have to fight a powerful demon. Joining one of the strongest swordsmen - the flaming pillar Kyojuro Rengoku, the heroes challenge the enemy, while the train "Infinite" rushes into the valley of despair..

title: Tenki no Ko
summary: High school senior Hodaka Morishima leaves his remote island home and moves to Tokyo, where he immediately squanders all his money and begins to be poor until he finds a job at a dubious occult magazine. And just as he begins his new duties, the weather turns bad and it rains every day. One day on the streets of a crowded and bustling city, Hodaka meets a girl named Hina Amano. Due to some circumstances, Hina and her younger brother live alone, but have a fun and healthy life. She can stop the rain and disperse the clouds.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0 Movie
summary:
A boy, Yuta, and a girl, Rika, agree to get married when they come of age. Rika reinforces the seriousness of her intentions with a wedding ring, which she gives to Yuta. The boy accepts the gift, confirming his agreement to a future together. Soon Rika tragically dies under the wheels of a car in front of Yuta. The desperation of the dying girl gives birth to the strongest monster - a curse, which becomes an invisible guardian of Utah and cruelly punishes all his offenders.
A series of inexplicable emergencies attracts the attention of a magical association, which places Yuta under the supervision of Satoru Gojo, the strongest magician in Japan, who teaches at the Tokyo Magic School. Yuta makes new classmate friends, each with their own set of oddities and abilities. New knowledge about the structure of the magical world sparks hope that the boy will be able to dispel the curse of Ricky. But first he must survive a deadly battle with Suguru Gato, a high school graduate who has turned to the dark side.
The strongest evil magician intends to get Rika and with the help of her power to change the world order. All humans will be destroyed, and only the strongest mages who support Gato will gain power. Yuta, Satoru Gojo and other students do not agree with this and try to destroy the dark plan of the cruel magician with all their might.

title: Kimi no Na wa.
summary:
The action in the anime Your Name will take place in two cities. The main characters are a couple of ordinary people who do not even suspect that soon fate will connect their lives very firmly. They have never been acquainted, she is a favorite daughter who devotes her free time to work in the temple. He is a reliable friend, successful and hard-working at work, has not bad tasks of a talented artist. Her life is calm and measured in a small provincial town, while he lives in a huge metropolis, full of turmoil and constant escapism.
Mitsuha Miyamizu and Taki Tachibana have never met each other, and yet one strange event binds them together. One day in a dream they switch bodies and it's unclear how to control this process. This begins to repeat more and more often, which will create a lot of problems in the lives of our heroes, because waking up every day in someone else's bed in someone else's house is not very pleasant. But what is the reason for such unusual metamorphosis? This is what the main characters will have to figure out.

title: Koe no Katachi
summary:
Everyone can make mistakes, but not everyone can realize it, then they feel shame. The plot of this anime tells the story of a boy Shoya Ishida and a girl Shoko Nishimiya. The girl has had hearing problems since childhood, and she had to suffer a lot because of it. The narrative starts at school, with their acquaintance, little Shoko is transferred to Shoya. She is initially disliked by most people, due to the fact that she was different from the others. He then makes the decision to ruin her life and bullies her.
The frequent bullying of young Shoko gets to a scary point, the guys just shamed her everywhere, made fun of her and made her cry all the time. One day, Shoya goes out of line, randomly, he hurts her right ear, after which the girl stops hearing them. She can no longer tolerate and moves to another city, the culprit begins a strong psychological disorder, feels a strong sense of guilt. And so in high school they meet. He realizes that this is a chance to correct the past between them.

title: Nakitai Watashi wa Neko wo Kaburu
summary: Miyo Sasaki, nicknamed "Muge", is an active and bright girl who is head over heels in love with her classmate Kento Hinode. Miyo's attempts to attract his attention fail, but the situation changes when she finds a magical mask that allows her to transform into "Taro", the cute white cat that Kento loves so much. The course of events seems tempting, but as time passes, the boundary between the girl and the cat begins to disappear.

title: Kimetsu no Yaiba Movie: Mugen Ressha-hen

summary:

title: Tenki no Ko
summary: High school senior Hodaka Morishima leaves his remote island home and moves to Tokyo, where he immediately squanders all his money and begins to be poor until he finds a job at a dubious occult magazine. And just as he begins his new duties, the weather turns bad and it rains every day. One day on the streets of a crowded and bustling city, Hodaka meets a girl named Hina Amano. Due to some circumstances, Hina and her younger brother live alone, but have a fun and healthy life. She can stop the rain and disperse the clouds.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0 Movie
summary:
A boy, Yuta, and a girl, Rika, agree to get married when they come of age. Rika reinforces the seriousness of her intentions with a wedding ring, which she gives to Yuta. The boy accepts the gift, confirming his agreement to a future together. Soon Rika tragically dies under the wheels of a car in front of Yuta. The desperation of the dying girl gives birth to the strongest monster - a curse, which becomes an invisible guardian of Utah and cruelly punishes all his offenders.
A series of inexplicable emergencies attracts the attention of a magical association, which places Yuta under the supervision of Satoru Gojo, the strongest magician in Japan, who teaches at the Tokyo Magic School. Yuta makes new classmate friends, each with their own set of oddities and abilities. New knowledge about the structure of the magical world sparks hope that the boy will be able to dispel the curse of Ricky. The strongest evil magician intends to get Rika and with the help of her power to change the world order. All humans will be destroyed, and only the strongest mages who support Gato will gain power. Yuta, Satoru Gojo and other students do not agree with this and try to destroy the dark plan of the cruel magician with all their might.

title: Kimi no Na wa.
summary:

They have never been acquainted, she is a favorite daughter who devotes her free time to work in the temple. He is a reliable friend, successful and hard-working at work, has not bad tasks of a talented artist. Her life is calm and measured in a small provincial town, while he lives in a huge metropolis, full of turmoil and constant escapism.
Mitsuha Miyamizu and Taki Tachibana have never met each other, and yet one strange event binds them together. One day in a dream they switch bodies and it's unclear how to control this process. This begins to repeat more and more often, which will create a lot of problems in the lives of our heroes, because waking up every day in someone else's bed in someone else's house is not very pleasant. Miyo's attempts to attract his attention fail, but the situation changes when she finds a magical mask that allows her to transform into "Taro", the cute white cat that Kento loves so much. The course of events seems tempting, but as time passes, the boundary between the girl and the cat begins to disappear.

title: Kimetsu no Yaiba Movie: Mugen Ressha-hen
family: The blade that cuts through demons
summary:
A full-length sequel to the anime series "Demon-Splitting Blade".
Tanjiro and his friends complete their recreational training at the Butterfly House and go on a new mission. Something fishy is going on on the Infinite Train: over 40 people disappear overnight! That means Tanjiro, Nezuko, Inosuke and Zenitsu will have to fight a powerful demon. Joining one of the strongest swordsmen - the flaming pillar Kyojuro Rengoku, the heroes challenge the enemy, while the train "Infinite" rushes into the valley of despair..

title: Tenki no Ko
summary: High school senior Hodaka Morishima leaves his remote island home and moves to Tokyo, where he immediately squanders all his money and begins to be poor until he finds a job at a dubious occult magazine. And just as he begins his new duties, the weather turns bad and it rains every day. One day on the streets of a crowded and bustling city, Hodaka meets a girl named Hina Amano. Due to some circumstances, Hina and her younger brother live alone, but have a fun and healthy life. She can stop the rain and disperse the clouds.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0 Movie
summary:
A boy, Yuta, and a girl, Rika, agree to get married when they come of age. Rika reinforces the seriousness of her intentions with a wedding ring, which she gives to Yuta. The boy accepts the gift, confirming his agreement to a future together. Soon Rika tragically dies under the wheels of a car in front of Yuta. The desperation of the dying girl gives birth to the strongest monster - a curse, which becomes an invisible guardian of Utah and cruelly punishes all his offenders.
A series of inexplicable emergencies attracts the attention of a magical association, which places Yuta under the supervision of Satoru Gojo, the strongest magician in Japan, who teaches at the Tokyo Magic School. Yuta makes new classmate friends, each with their own set of oddities and abilities. New knowledge about the structure of the magical world sparks hope that the boy will be able to dispel the curse of Ricky. But first he must survive a deadly battle with Suguru Gato, a high school graduate who has turned to the dark side.
The strongest evil magician intends to get Rika and with the help of her power to change the world order. All humans will be destroyed, and only the strongest mages who support Gato will gain power. Yuta, Satoru Gojo and other students do not agree with this and try to destroy the dark plan of the cruel magician with all their might.

title: Kimi no Na wa.
summary:
The action in the anime Your Name will take place in two cities. The main characters are a couple of ordinary people who do not even suspect that soon fate will connect their lives very firmly. They have never been acquainted, she is a favorite daughter who devotes her free time to work in the temple. He is a reliable friend, successful and hard-working at work, has not bad tasks of a talented artist. Her life is calm and measured in a small provincial town, while he lives in a huge metropolis, full of turmoil and constant escapism.
Mitsuha Miyamizu and Taki Tachibana have never met each other, and yet one strange event binds them together. One day in a dream they switch bodies and it's unclear how to control this process. This begins to repeat more and more often, which will create a lot of problems in the lives of our heroes, because waking up every day in someone else's bed in someone else's house is not very pleasant. But what is the reason for such unusual metamorphosis? This is what the main characters will have to figure out.

title: Koe no Katachi
summary:
Everyone can make mistakes, but not everyone can realize it, then they feel shame. The plot of this anime tells the story of a boy Shoya Ishida and a girl Shoko Nishimiya. The girl has had hearing problems since childhood, and she had to suffer a lot because of it. The narrative starts at school, with their acquaintance, little Shoko is transferred to Shoya. She is initially disliked by most people, due to the fact that she was different from the others. He then makes the decision to ruin her life and bullies her.
The frequent bullying of young Shoko gets to a scary point, the guys just shamed her everywhere, made fun of her and made her cry all the time. One day, Shoya goes out of line, randomly, he hurts her right ear, after which the girl stops hearing them. She can no longer tolerate and moves to another city, the culprit begins a strong psychological disorder, feels a strong sense of guilt. And so in high school they meet. He realizes that this is a chance to correct the past between them.

The girl has had hearing problems since childhood, and she had to suffer a lot because of it. The narrative starts at school, with their acquaintance, little Shoko is transferred to Shoya. She is initially disliked by most people, due to the fact that she was different from the others. He then makes the decision to ruin her life and bullies her.
The frequent bullying of young Shoko gets to a scary point, the guys just shamed her everywhere, made fun of her and made her cry all the time. One day, Shoya goes out of line, randomly, he hurts her right ear, after which the girl stops hearing them. She can no longer tolerate and moves to another city, the culprit begins a strong psychological disorder, feels a strong sense of guilt. And so in high school they meet. He realizes that this is a chance to correct the past between them.

title: Nakitai Watashi wa Neko wo Kaburu
summary: Miyo Sasaki, nicknamed "Muge", is an active and bright girl who is head over heels in love with her classmate Kento Hinode. Miyo's attempts to attract his attention fail, but the situation changes when she finds a magical mask that allows her to transform into "Taro", the cute white cat that Kento loves so much. The course of events seems tempting, but as time passes, the boundary between the girl and the cat begins to disappear.

title: Kimetsu no Yaiba Movie: Mugen Ressha-hen
family: The blade that cuts through demons
summary:
A full-length sequel to the anime series "Demon-Splitting Blade".
Tanjiro and his friends complete their recreational training at the Butterfly House and go on a new mission. Something fishy is going on on the Infinite Train: over 40 people disappear overnight! That means Tanjiro, Nezuko, Inosuke and Zenitsu will have to fight a powerful demon. Joining one of the strongest swordsmen - the flaming pillar Kyojuro Rengoku, the heroes challenge the enemy, while the train "Infinite" rushes into the valley of despair..

title: Tenki no Ko
summary: High school senior Hodaka Morishima leaves his remote island home and moves to Tokyo, where he immediately squanders all his money and begins to be poor until he finds a job at a dubious occult magazine. And just as he begins his new duties, the weather turns bad and it rains every day. One day on the streets of a crowded and bustling city, Hodaka meets a girl named Hina Amano. Due to some circumstances, Hina and her younger brother live alone, but have a fun and healthy life. She can stop the rain and disperse the clouds.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0 Movie
summary:
A boy, Yuta, and a girl, Rika, agree to get married when they come of age. Rika reinforces the seriousness of her intentions with a wedding ring, which she gives to Yuta. The boy accepts the gift, confirming his agreement to a future together. Soon Rika tragically dies under the wheels of a car in front of Yuta. The desperation of the dying girl gives birth to the strongest monster - a curse, which becomes an invisible guardian of Utah and cruelly punishes all his offenders.
A series of inexplicable emergencies attracts the attention of a magical association, which places Yuta under the supervision of Satoru Gojo, the strongest magician in Japan, who teaches at the Tokyo Magic School. Yuta makes new classmate friends, each with their own set of oddities and abilities. New knowledge about the structure of the magical world sparks hope that the boy will be able to dispel the curse of Ricky. But first he must survive a deadly battle with Suguru Gato, a high school graduate who has turned to the dark side.
The strongest evil magician intends to get Rika and with the help of her power to change the world order. All humans will be destroyed, and only the strongest mages who support Gato will gain power. Yuta, Satoru Gojo and other students do not agree with this and try to destroy the dark plan of the cruel magician with all their might.

title: Kimi no Na wa.
summary:
The action in the anime Your Name will take place in two cities. The main characters are a couple of ordinary people who do not even suspect that soon fate will connect their lives very firmly. They have never been acquainted, she is a favorite daughter who devotes her free time to work in the temple. He is a reliable friend, successful and hard-working at work, has not bad tasks of a talented artist. Her life is calm and measured in a small provincial town, while he lives in a huge metropolis, full of turmoil and constant escapism.
Mitsuha Miyamizu and Taki Tachibana have never met each other, and yet one strange event binds them together. One day in a dream they switch bodies and it's unclear how to control this process. This begins to repeat more and more often, which will create a lot of problems in the lives of our heroes, because waking up every day in someone else's bed in someone else's house is not very pleasant. But what is the reason for such unusual metamorphosis? This is what the main characters will have to figure out.

And just as he begins his new duties, the weather turns bad and it rains every day. One day on the streets of a crowded and bustling city, Hodaka meets a girl named Hina Amano. Due to some circumstances, Hina and her younger brother live alone, but have a fun and healthy life. She can stop the rain and disperse the clouds.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0 Movie
summary:
A boy, Yuta, and a girl, Rika, agree to get married when they come of age. Rika reinforces the seriousness of her intentions with a wedding ring, which she gives to Yuta. The boy accepts the gift, confirming his agreement to a future together. Soon Rika tragically dies under the wheels of a car in front of Yuta. The desperation of the dying girl gives birth to the strongest monster - a curse, which becomes an invisible guardian of Utah and cruelly punishes all his offenders.
A series of inexplicable emergencies attracts the attention of a magical association, which places Yuta under the supervision of Satoru Gojo, the strongest magician in Japan, who teaches at the Tokyo Magic School. Yuta makes new classmate friends, each with their own set of oddities and abilities. New knowledge about the structure of the magical world sparks hope that the boy will be able to dispel the curse of Ricky. But first he must survive a deadly battle with Suguru Gato, a high school graduate who has turned to the dark side.
The strongest evil magician intends to get Rika and with the help of her power to change the world order. All humans will be destroyed, and only the strongest mages who support Gato will gain power. Yuta, Satoru Gojo and other students do not agree with this and try to destroy the dark plan of the cruel magician with all their might.
